synopsis.text:
Earth faces a dire threat as the malevolent Demon Empire resurfaces after eons of dormancy, intent on dominating the planet. In response, the colossal, robot-like guardian of the vanished Mu civilization, Reideen, stirs from its golden pyramid slumber. Reideen identifies Akira Hibiki, a young Japanese boy, as the last descendant of the ancient Mu people and entrusts him with the mission to safeguard Earth.

Akira is not left to face this monumental task alone. Joining him in his battle are Mari Sakurano, the daughter of a scientist actively resisting the Demon Empire, and several of his high school soccer teammates. Together, they strive to thwart the Demon Empire's tyranny and its formidable fossil beasts.

Complicating matters, the Demon Empire has kidnapped Akira's father and other scientists in a quest to locate a mysterious substance called Mutron. Akira and his allies must navigate this perilous journey to rescue the captives and halt the Demon Empire's sinister ambitions. The fate of Earth hangs in the balance, and only Akira and his brave companions can restore peace to the planet.
